params.message: echo @echo off > setup.bat && echo cd TANGO >> setup.bat && echo git clone https://github.com/justinjohn0306/Wav2Lip.git >> setup.bat && echo git clone https://github.com/dajes/frame-interpolation-pytorch.git >> setup.bat && echo conda create -p ./env python=3.9.20 -y >> setup.bat && echo conda run -p ./env pip install -r pre-requirements.txt >> setup.bat && echo conda run -p ./env pip install -r requirements.txt >> setup.bat

params.html: TANGO installation completed! Note: First run will download necessary checkpoints (~35GB)
